title: 115_hr3119
content: st Century STEM for Girls and Underrepresented Minorities Act This bill amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to authorize the Department of Education to provide grants to local educational agenciesnbsp. To encourage the ongoing development of programs and curricula for girls and underrepresented minorities in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics and prepare those studentsnbsp. To pursue undergraduate and graduate degrees and careers in such fields.
